name: Standing Back Handspring
description: A backward handspring from a standing position, commonly used as a transition skill.
shapeTip: Arms by ears, tight core, aggressive push from hands.

name: Roundoff Back Handspring
description: A tumbling combo that begins with a roundoff to generate momentum, immediately followed by a back handspring.
shapeTip: Keep the roundoff tight and fast; snap down aggressively to drive power into the handspring.

name: Standing Back Tuck
description: A standing backflip executed without using the hands.
shapeTip: Explode upward, tuck tightly, and spot the landing quickly to maintain control.
